name: Bite The Armor
description:
How to play:

- Choose a zombie from a list
- Simply tap the screen to spawn a chosen zombie
- Combine zombies’ attacks and create your own strategy in order to complete all levels

Game features:
4 terrifying zombie types
Various maps and surroundings
Easy and intuitive controls

This game is an amazing mix of strategy and classic tower defense. Each zombie is unique in his own way and you will need all of them to complete all levels!
